item.description:
What a better way to start the year with self reflecting on what your priorities are. How is you spiritual life? How connected are you with the Universe?
This new weekly series for 6 weeks is designed to help you to understand the laws of the universe, start or deepen your meditation practice and explore the foundations of Mysticism. Even if some of the Teachings are based on the Christian Mystical Tradition, this is open to all. There is no restriction on faith and spiritual background. You only have to believe that there is most likely a power and intelligence that is higher than human intelligence.

In each class we explore three areas:
• Spiritual exercises designed to help you develop skills needed for inner work and meditation
• Understanding the cosmos, the Laws and Beings that govern it, and our roles as living, conscious humans in that cosmos
• Hands-on experiences, through which you can learn to see, hear, and feel the spiritual world

These classes have been taught for many years to many people. Take this opportunity for yourself. If Wednesdays doesn't work with your schedule, there are some other dates and times in different locations like Jamaica Plain (near Stony Brook orange line) on Sundays at 12:30 pm and Newton (near Mass Pike) on Fridays at 7 pm.
Contact me if any questions via e-mail or phone. I will be glad to answers them.
Sincerely,
Rev. Christine 617-794-8208
item.how_to_find_us: Just ring the bell of the main door inside the porch. This location is my home
item.name: Series of classes on Meditation and Mysticism
